entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
